name: Riddles
title: A riddle is a statement, question or phrase having a double or veiled meaning, put forth as a puzzle to be solved

name: Deciphering
title: Rebus puzzles are basically little pictures, often made with letters and words, which cryptically represent a word.

name: Logic Puzzles
title: Puzzle requiring the use of the process of logical deduction to solve.Challenging questions don't involve numerical.

name: Jigsaw Puzzles
title: Any set of varied, irregularly shaped pieces that, when properly assembled, form a picture or map or picture.

name: Hidden Objects
title: Hidden object games are casual puzzle adventures where players must find hidden items in scenes in the puzzle.

name: Matching Puzzles
title: Matching games are games that require players to match similar elements. Participants need to find a match for a word.

name: Math
title: Math puzzles are one type of mind game that helps you to exercise your brain and boost your memory.

name: Keys!
title: The Lock and Key Puzzle is the oldest and most common puzzle types across adventure games, especially Interactive Fiction.

name: Magnet
title: Use 500 colorful magnetic Squares to make birds, animals, vehicles, objects and many amazing things.
